item.title: Back to Basics - Discontinued. Release in Downloads Section
item.dc:creator: @I_2h_k0_I I 2h k0 I
item.description:
@I_2h_k0_I wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:130, topic:276082”]Thanks. I added more, and the next thing I plan on doing is…

Adding Gold & Trimmed armor making. I plan to do this by using the armor piece on a Small Furnace with a gold bar in your inventory for the gold trim. For plain trimmed armor, I have to think about it.

But ya. More updates on the topic post, and I missed some stuff I can’t remember. Oh well.[/quote] Sounds Good.

Read full topic

item.title: Back to Basics - Discontinued. Release in Downloads Section
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Thanks. I added more, and the next thing I plan on doing is…

Adding Gold & Trimmed armor making. I plan to do this by using the armor piece on a Small Furnace with a gold bar in your inventory for the gold trim. For plain trimmed armor, I have to think about it.

But ya. More updates on the topic post, and I missed some stuff I can’t remember. Oh well.

we will see. and bugs are piss easy to get out of delta, just finished adding dueling we working on fixing the dupes and bugs.

Well, all bugs have to be found before they can be fixed, right?
[/quote]
ofc, but as i said the bugs are very easy to fix, the problem is just that there is a piss load of them. I think all the huge bugs are fixed on mine, not sure though but fixing glitches and dupes on my dueling atm.[/quote]Gtfo and never come back. No one cares about your fixed Delta, so stop trying to hijack this topic. You’ve made your point about giving a shit less about this project so I don’t care to hear your opinions anymore.

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:112, topic:276082”][quote author=9d n 1 n e link=topic=364626.msg2799701#msg2799701 date=1243294709]

i tested it its the shit

sorry, no.
[/quote]You haven’t liked this project from the start so you probably didn’t even try everything out. My server is probably one of the servers out there based off of DeltaScape that has the most bugfixes, and I’m still tracking down ones.

Right now, I’m working on cleaning out client.java and putting packet handlers into classes. I’ve got some more plans for features too. So we’re talking a release within the next week.[/quote]

So, you’re not having all the packets handled in one method? If so, you shouldn’t.

item.title: Back to Basics - Discontinued. Release in Downloads Section
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If you want to test, you can download the client here.
http://www.mediafire.com/?njzjmdwnzfd

However, I’ll just let you know that I’m probably going to update it again with renames/recolors.

Note: My custom items aren’t weapons or armor, but things needed to make the game realistic (Eg. Dragon bars).

To make safe gems:
Search a hay bale for 4 gems. It’s random so good luck. Use a hammer on each gem. Use a shard on the small furnace. Use the uncharged safe game on the Mysterious Glow (You need 25 Magic).

To raise Construction:
Type ::build. Click the icon for tips.

To raise Firemaking: Obvious. Buy logs from the Construction store.

To raise Woodcutting:
Grow trees from Construction and cut.

For now, you can’t get lobster pots. But you can still fish at the Varrock Fountain.

There’s more to figure out for yourself. I’ve got to go. Be back later.

Read full topic
